gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components
Interface IMutableVirtualArrayList1D

All Superinterfaces:
IVirtualArray, IVirtualArrayList1D
public interface IMutableVirtualArrayList1D
extends IVirtualArrayList1D

This interface defines methods to set values and error values for elements of an IVirtualArrayList1D.
